posts.postText:
For the weekend: THE NETHER WILL ENTER GOLDCRAFT. YOU WILL BE ABLE TO GET ALL THOSE COVETED NETHER ITEMS THAT US ADMINS HAVE BEEN USING AND YOU HAVE NOT.

Happy waiting in hair-tearing anxiety until this weekend.

How do you plan to do that?
Really wondering!
In other news, we will also be switching servers this week to reduce lag and in Pirate's words "better everything" ;)

The Nether can be enabled with one simple console command on the server computer.
It's been impossible for us to implement, up until now, because our current hosts were messing with our bandwidth and creating enormous lag problems.
With the new host, The Nether should be no problem.
